DevOps: Course Outline Fall 2018

Units for online course:

  1. Communication is at the core. Tool: Slack
  2. Incremental development enables continual releases
  3. Control of our source code is essential to rapid deployment. Tools: git and GitHUb
  4. Controlling the flow of work to avoid waste. Tools: kanban boards (Trello)
  5. Software as infrastructure: virtual machines and containers
  6. Automating builds: make
  7. To be confident in rapid releases, we must automate testing
  8. Automating deployment: Chef, Puppet and Ansible. Cloud deployment.
  9. We have to know what the software is up to: monitoring tools
  10. The meaning of DevOps in the larger work setting
